thread.title: Babies' VERY strained faces as they fill their nappies
thread.title_full: Babies' VERY strained faces as they fill their nappies

title: Babies' VERY strained faces as they fill their nappies
text: This tot looks pretty pleased with himself regardless This baby looks quizzical as she works on doing her business Expressions range from pained, to tearful, to strained, to in the case of this baby, plain shocked This cute baby almost looks close to tears through the effort of it all This little lad looks particularly unimpressed The expression on some of the babies' faces suggests it had come as something of a surprise This baby's face ballooned up as he exerted his energy on the business of pooping It's hard to tell if this baby is upset by his bowels or the bizarre array of patterns around him This baby celebrated reaching the grand old age of three months with a poop picture This tiny newborn was already ready to get down to business A little dribble escaped this baby's mouth as he strained to let nature take its course It's the most natural thing in the world - but this baby looks confused regardless This little lady was going cross-eyed from the effort This little trooper manages to look adorable even when filling their nappy Spying this expression on a tot's face might spark a row between parents over who is on nappy changing duty Newborn babies spend most of their time sleeping, eating or pooping - and we all know which of the three is happening in this snap When you're this tiny, even going to the toilet requires a mammoth effort Plenty of the babies featured in the online gallery look quite tearful as a result of their efforts This cheeky little one looks coy as he allows nature to take its course Share or comment on this article Most watched News videos
